segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, like nothing else matters right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, two kids are up to something near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a little stool, reaching high into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh wow, the stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there with her hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet, and the sink is overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle but doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how the garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and make a bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies look tempting, thoughâ€”I wouldn't mind one myself.
segments.speaker: PAR
